borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Variation of Conditions 2 (Approved drawings), 3 (Materials), 6 (Highway crossover), 7 (Cycle store), 8 (Refuse), 9 (Flood risk), 10 (Preliminary risk assessment), 11 (Site investigation, 12 (Risk assessment), 13 (Remediation method statement), 14 (Verification report), 15 (Onward monitoring), 16 (Ventilation strategy), 17 (Ventilation compliance), 18 (Air quality/emissions), 19 (CLP), 20 (Demolition management), 21 (Sound insulation), 22 (Noise assessment), and 24 (Single dwelling) of planning permission reference: 2022/00536/FUL granted 10th August 2023 for the 'Demolition of the existing single storey garage in the rear garden and erection of a replacement two storey plus-basement single family dwellinghouse; alterations to the main building at no. 12 Ongar Road to include: erection of a single storey rear extension, to the side and rear of the existing back addition at basement level; erection of an external staircase from basement to ground floor level at the rear of the property; infilling of 1no. window at the side of rear back additions at ground and first floor level (northern elevation); installation of a new window to replace the existing window to the side of rear back addition, and replacement of existing doors with a new window to the rear of proposed bedroom 5 at basement level; replacement of selected windows with new double glazed windows, and relocation of 2no. windows to southern and eastern elevation of the main building at no. 12 Ongar Road; formation of a cycle and refuse store with an air source heat pump attached to the store; erection of boundary wall and gates to Sedlescombe Road elevation.' Amendments sought to divide the development into 2no. phases: phase 1 - construction of development consented within area 1 (lined orange) or area 2 (lined green) and phase 2 - construction of development consented within area 1 (lined orange) or area 2 (lined green), and to update other conditions to reflect this change.
